item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0023; 12:51AM; 6669 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IoPm17; #NorthHollywood; It took 34 firefighters operating in mostly defensive mode to extinguish flames in the vacant commercial building in 24 minutes. Firefighters protected the nearby structures, without injury. Cause under investigation. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA77 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0023; 12:27AM; 6669 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IoPm17; #NorthHollywood; One-story commercial building with fire showing. Defensive mode. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA77 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1600; 09:24PM; 10328 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZmpBp7; #Chatsworth; 18 Firefighters extinguished the flames, which spread through the attached garage and attic, in 26 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E273 E28 E296 E70 RA107 T73 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1600; 08:58PM; 10328 N Keokuk Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZmpBp7; #Chatsworth; One-story single-family home with fire in the garage. Offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E296 RA107 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1576; 10:01PM; 13482 W Trego Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lVJe94; Sylmar; LAFD Air Operations is conducting a hoist operation for a 19yo female hiker. They will relocate her to a safe landing zone and transfer care to the ground ambulance for an evaluation. She does not appear to have any injuries at this time but was unable to safely descend the terrain. The 9-1-1 call was received at 9:11PM. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E98 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA7 RH114 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#1477; 07:57PM; Eb 101 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IKE9t1; Sepulveda Basin; One patient (age/gender unknown) riding motorcycle was trapped fully beneath a SUV and was sadly beyond medical help, determine dead on scene. CHP will conduct the investigation and traffic will be impact for the duration of their operation. Drivers are advised to consult CHP traffic alerts and seek alternate routes. CHP Log# 2425. No further details.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E83 RA83 RA93 RA99 T88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1716; 10:47PM; 5728 S 6th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IHgzxu; #HydePark; Firefighters mounted a coordinated attack between rooftop ventilation and interior fire attack, on the home that contained excessive storage conditions inside. All occupants from the structure safely escaped. Ultimately, it took 20 firefighters 16 minutes to extinguish the flames, without injury. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1716; 10:31PM; 5728 S 6th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IHgzxu; #HydePark; One-story single-family home with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Train vs Vehicle - Physical Rescue 02/20/2023 INC#1364

item.description: Update Train vs Vehicle - Physical Rescue; INC#1364; 07:10PM; 1629 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KiFuWn; #CentralAlameda; A total of 5 people were in the vehicle that was struck by a Metro A (Blue) line train. Two were deceased on scene. Three have been transported to local hospitals in fair-to-moderate condition. Unknown ages/genders/circumstances. Approximately 125 passengers have now exited the train, without medical complaint. Two train operators have also disembarked. One is being evaluated as a precaution.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E17 E21 E221 E288 E88 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA21 RA25 RA801 RA9 SQ21 T21 T88 UR88; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Train vs Vehicle - Physical Rescue 02/20/2023 INC#1364

item.description: Train vs Vehicle - Physical Rescue; INC#1364; 06:16PM; 1629 E 24th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KiFuWn; #CentralAlameda; Firefighters found a vehicle that was struck by a train, with two patients trapped inside. Both patients were quickly extricated, but sadly, one was beyond medical help. The other will be transported in grave condition. A third patient is being assessed on scene for seemingly-minor injuries. Crews searched the train for additional injuries, but found no complaints from passengers. Unknown ages/genders/circumstances/affiliations.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E17 E21 E221 E288 E88 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA21 SQ21 T21 T88 UR88; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange
